name: ETea
storyline: Welcome to ETea, the hottest boba store in town! In this blend of simulation and bobarista action, you play as Glorbo... an alien who crash-landed on Earth. After a misunderstanding gets them hired at ETea, Glorbo attempts to blend in as a human while navigating a solitary life far from home.
summary: Help Glorbo master the art of making boba to satisfy customers and take down bosses in this unique blend of simulation and bobarista action!
